text: Yastava, allahacya hukumane tyanni satrula parabhuta kele ani da'udane jalutala thara marale ani allahane tyala rajya ani hikamata taseca jevadhe icchile jnanahi pradana kele ani jara allaha, kahi lokanna itara samuhadvare hatavita rahila nasata tara dharativara phasada pasarala asata, parantu allaha ya jagatila lokanvara phara krpa karanara ahe
